solution_line_template: Ellie needs {num_wheels} wheels * {oil_per_wheel}ml of oil per wheel = <<{num_wheels}*{oil_per_wheel}={oil_for_wheels}>>{oil_for_wheels}ml of oil.
To fix the rest of the bike as well, she needs {oil_for_wheels} + {oil_for_rest_of_bike} = <<{oil_for_wheels}+{oil_for_rest_of_bike}={total_oil_needed}>>{total_oil_needed}ml of oil.
